casebody.data:
RICHARD ALLEN PREPARATORY CHARTER SCHOOL, Appellee
v.
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION; and Pedro A. Rivera, in his Official Capacity as Secretary of Education, Appellants KIPP Philadelphia Charter Schools, Appellee
v.
Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Education; and Pedro A. Rivera, in his Official Capacity as Secretary of Education, Appellants No. 19 EAP 2017
No. 20 EAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 1, 2018 Roberto Tomas Datorre, Pennsylvania Office of General Counsel, PA Office of Inspector General, Harrisburg, PA, for Appellant. Patricia A. Hennessy, Judson Aaron, Andrew Kabnick Garden, Kathleen Marie Nagle, Conrad O'Brien PC, Philadelphia, PA, for Appellee.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 1 st day of June, 2018, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED .
